location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘General Map Bahrein Island, Persian Gulf. F-956’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Blueprint on tracing paperDimensions:1385 x 818 mm, on sheet 1410 x 847 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint sketch map dated 21 May 1934 produced by the Bahrein Petroleum Company, sent with a copy of the 1935 Annual Report describing the operations of the Company (folios 69-75).Shows the location of wells and various other facilities including water, oil and gas pipe lines; pump stations; and camp sites; with telephone and power lines, company and native roads indicated and explained in a key provided in the lower left portion of the map. Topographical contours show the position of Jebel Dukham.Revised copy of this map can be found at IOR/R/15/1/662, f 77.
